Desc.entry: Arranges social activities (including local history group, outings etc) and deals with tenants' enquiries. Holds coffee mornings during opening times, Children in Need concert and a Macmillan coffee morning.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon, Tues & Wed 10am-12noon (office hours); Mon pm (bingo), Wed 10am-12noon (history group), monthly coffee morning, Mar & Nov (general meetings)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 4
